    • compress

      public boolean compress(ByteBuffer in, ByteBuffer out, ByteBuffer overflow, CompressionCodec.Options options) throws IOException
      Compresses an input ByteBuffer into an output ByteBuffer using Zstandard compression. If the maximum bound of the number of output bytes exceeds the output ByteBuffer size, the remaining bytes are written to the overflow ByteBuffer.
      Specified by:
      compress in interface CompressionCodec
      Parameters:
      in - the bytes to compress
      out - the compressed bytes
      overflow - put any additional bytes here
      options - the options to control compression
      Returns:
      ZstdOptions
      Throws:
      IOException
